text:
def fibonaccirainbow(text):
	x = 1
	y = 1
	z = x + y
	fn = []
	count = 0
	ret = ''
	cl = '</c>'
	c2 = 0
	while z < len(text):
		x = y
		y = z
		z = x + y
		fn.append(z)
	colors = ['<c=red>','<c=orange>','<c=yellow>','<c=green>','<c=blue>','<c=indigo>','<c=violet>']
	colors2 = colors*int(len(fn)/len(colors))
	for i in text:
		count += 1
		if count in fn:
			c2 +=1
			i = cl+colors2[c2]+i
			ret += i
			
		else:
			ret += i
	ret = colors2[0]+ret+cl
	return ret
fibonaccirainbow.command = "fbr"
